history.proof: assert (norm x = norm (fst x, snd x)) as H by auto. rewrite H. strivial use: @norm_prod, Rle_trans, @norm_le_prod_norm_1, Rmax_r unfold: NormedModule.sort, prod_NormedModule, fst, Rmax, snd.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K x : U * V H : norm x = norm (fst x, snd x) Unable to unify "Rmax (norm ?M2364) (norm ?M2365) <= norm (?M2364, ?M2365) <= sqrt 2 * Rmax (norm ?M2364) (norm ?M2365)" with "norm (snd x) < norm (fst x, snd x) \\/ norm (snd x) = norm (fst x, snd x)".

original: assert (norm x = norm (fst x, snd x)) as H by auto. rewrite H. apply norm_prod.
